data.title: 11.L11.TLBG + BTTL + Đabt
data.meta_description: 11.L11.TLBG + BTTL + ĐABT - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The speaker provides instructions for evacuating the building in the event of a fire. Staff should head to the main stairs when they hear the fire alarm and leave the building, unless it sounds at 11am on Tuesdays which is a test. Once outside, staff should look for fire marshals wearing orange jackets who will direct them to the designated waiting area. Each department has a fire safety officer responsible for checking that all staff have evacuated, and reporting any missing people to the fire safety manager. Staff are not to re-enter the building until the fire safety manager says it is safe.
